display.title: Varied Block Types
display.description:
Inspired by the popular Chisel mod, Chipped allous builders to have their full range of creativity because every bock deserves a friend!

To start out all you have to do is craft one of the seven tables that allow you to change various vanilla blocks into their chipped variants. All tables look different, but work the same, so you can pick whichever looks best in your build, or make a few different ones and spread them out in your home. Whatever you want to do, Chipped can help you bring it to life!

See JEI for all the blocks you can use to build!
